aboutdeveloper.message: nickw.de is the developer of Molly.

startnewtabfirst.message: Please open a new tab before continuing.

pressentertostart.message: Please press enter to start the current input .

matching_commands.message: Your input is matching the following results:

typehelpforhelp.message: Please type "Help" in case you need my assistance.

welcome.message: Hey my name is Molly. I am going to help you to find information in which you might be interested in. Just ask me.

thousandtimesused.message: Hey it's me again. You already used me a thousand times. Don't you think it's time to give a little donation?:

headline1.message: Hi {name}! What are you interested in?

headline2.message: Hey {name}! Is there anything I can help you with?

nocardsfornotification.message: Sie haben keine Karten für Benachrichtigungen ausgewählt.

dropcardstoremove.message: Drop cards if you aren't interested anymore.

nocardstoshowincardslider.message: Sie haben keine Karten ausgewählt, an denen Sie dauerhaft interessiert sind. Sie können das tun, nachdem Sie einen Befehl eingegeben haben, und anschließend auf "Diese Info beobachten?" klicken!
You have no information, you are interested in regulary. You can add information after you ask a question, and click on the "I'm interested regulary" link.

alreadyonlist.message: You already are interested in this information!

getnotifforthis.message: Do you want notification for this information?

cantviewwithoutpermission.message: Without this permission you can't see this information.

startwithoutname.message: Start without a name. (You can do this later if you want)

alwayslisten.message: always active (beta) (Say "Ok Molly" to start a voice input)

minimalexplain.message: (recommended for slow Computer. Molly is faster, but doesn't look so nice)

sprachausgabehilfe.message: Here are all the information, which Molly can tell you something about.

morethanonecity.message: Sorry there are more than one citys. Please enter a country.

weatherforcast.message: It's {temp} Degrees in {city}. The weather is {weather}

heretosites.message: Here are your most visited websites.

keinalarm.message: You have no alarms. Add one with the input field.

enteratime.message: Enter the minutes after the alarm should ring.

entervalidstream.message: The entered RSS Stream is not valid.

descriptionrss.message: Abbonieren Sie einen RSS Stream. Geben Sie hierzu “RSS“ und anschließend die URL des RSS Streams ein. Diesen finden Sie auf fast jeder großen Website. Hiermit können Sie sich zum Beispiel News zusammenstellen. Ein weiteres Beispiel ist ihr persönlicher Facebook Newsstream.
abbonate a rss stream. Just enter "RSS" and then the url of the stream. Almost every big website have a rss stream. Like facebook, news, communitys, blogs.

descriptioncalc.message: Starten Sie einen kleinen Taschenrechner. Dieser beherrscht neben den Grundrechenarten (+-*/) auch alle Features der JavaScriptsprache. Um zum Beispiel die Wurzel von 9 auszurechnen geben Sie Math.sqrt(9) ein. Der Taschenrechner funktioniert übrigens auch, wenn sie statt “Rechne“ einfach die Aufgabe z.B. 2+5 eingeben.
Start a little calculator. It can all the standart calculus, and also things from javascript. E.g. To solve a root just enter "Math.sqrt(9)"

descriptionweather.message: Here is the weather at your location. Enter a city to see the weather from a city all over the world.

descriptionclock.message: What's the clock in a city around the world?

descriptionjoke.message: See a random funny ninegag post.

startwithfirststep.message: View the " first steps " tutorial again.

firststeps1.message: This is the main input. input your questions like "What's the weather like", and Molly will answer. To see what you can ask Molly enter "Help"

firststeps2.message: Here are your most visited websites. Just move your mouse to the right side to see it.

firststeps3.message: Here is the information slider. To add cards here (and to the popup), click on "I'm interested regulary" after input a question.

firststeps4.message: Gratulations, you have finsished the "first steps" tutorial. But there is so much more to discover. Let's go.

newupdate.message: A new update was installed. There are plenty new features. Just try it

msghelpsprachausgabeaus.message: Go to options, and then you will see how to do.

msghelpspenden.message: enter "info support" to support the developer.

msghelpspracheingabebeimbrowsen.message: Use the shortcut, or the popup the ask molly questions without starting a new tab.

msghelpshowcardslideronstart.message: Click on the eye at the right bottom corner after opening the information slider.
